mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.exchange_code , C.franchise_name , GROUP_CONCAT(E.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS item_name , A.reason , F.name AS member_name , A.created_at , G.status , A.approved FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code JOIN tbl_exchange_item D ON A.exchange_code = D.exchange_code JOIN tbl_item E ON D.item_code = E.item_code LEFT JOIN tbl_member F ON A.member_code = F.member_code JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history G ON A.exchange_code = G.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON G.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND G.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at GROUP BY A.exchange_code ) AS grouped_result;

SELECT A.exchange_code , C.franchise_name , GROUP_CONCAT(E.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS item_name , A.reason , F.name AS member_name , A.created_at , G.status , A.approved FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code JOIN tbl_exchange_item D ON A.exchange_code = D.exchange_code JOIN tbl_item E ON D.item_code = E.item_code LEFT JOIN tbl_member F ON A.member_code = F.member_code JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history G ON A.exchange_code = G.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON G.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND G.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at GROUP BY A.exchange_code LIMIT #{ offset }, #{ pageSize };

SELECT A.exchange_code , C.franchise_name , GROUP_CONCAT(E.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS item_name , A.reason , F.name AS member_name , A.created_at , G.status , A.approved FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code JOIN tbl_exchange_item D ON A.exchange_code = D.exchange_code JOIN tbl_item E ON D.item_code = E.item_code JOIN tbl_member F ON A.member_code = F.member_code JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history G ON A.exchange_code = G.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON G.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND G.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at
AND CAST(A.exchange_code AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND C.franchise_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND F.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.created_at BETWEEN #{ startDate } AND CONCAT(#{ endDate }, ' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY A.exchange_code, C.franchise_name, A.reason, F.name, A.created_at, G.status, A.approved LIMIT #{ offset }, #{ pageSize };

SELECT A.exchange_code , A.created_at , C.franchise_name , A.reason , D.name AS member_name , A.comment , A.explanation FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code JOIN tbl_member D ON A.member_code = D.member_code WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode };
SELECT A.image_url FROM tbl_exchange_img A WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode };

SELECT B.item_unique_code , B.name AS item_name , C.name AS sub_category , D.name AS super_category , A.quantity FROM tbl_exchange_item A JOIN tbl_item B ON A.item_code = B.item_code JOIN tbl_sub_category C ON B.category_code = C.sub_category_code JOIN tbl_super_category D ON C.super_category_code = D.super_category_code WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode };
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_exchange_stock_history A JOIN tbl_exchange B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN tbl_member C ON B.member_code = C.member_code;

SELECT A.exchange_stock_history_code , A.status , A.manager , A.created_at , A.confirmed , A.exchange_code , C.name AS exchange_manager FROM tbl_exchange_stock_history A JOIN tbl_exchange B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN tbl_member C ON B.member_code = C.member_code LIMIT #{ offset }, #{ pageSize };

SELECT A.exchange_stock_history_code , A.status , A.manager , A.created_at , A.confirmed , A.exchange_code , C.name AS exchange_manager FROM tbl_exchange_stock_history A JOIN tbl_exchange B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN tbl_member C ON B.member_code = C.member_code
AND CAST(A.exchange_stock_history_code AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.manager LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND CAST(A.exchange_code AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND C.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.created_at BETWEEN #{ startDate } AND CONCAT(#{ endDate }, ' 23:59:59')
LIMIT #{ offset }, #{ pageSize };

SELECT A.exchange_stock_history_code , B.created_at AS exchange_create_at , D.franchise_name , B.reason , B.member_code AS exchange_manager , A.comment , A.created_at , A.status , A.manager FROM tbl_exchange_stock_history A JOIN tbl_exchange B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN tbl_order C ON B.order_code = C.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise D ON C.franchise_code = D.franchise_code WHERE A.exchange_stock_history_code = #{ exchangeStockHistoryCode };

SELECT B.item_unique_code , B.name AS item_name , C.name AS sub_category , D.name AS super_category , A.quantity , A.restock_quantity FROM tbl_exchange_item_status A JOIN tbl_item B ON A.item_code = B.item_code JOIN tbl_sub_category C ON B.category_code = C.sub_category_code JOIN tbl_super_category D ON C.super_category_code = D.super_category_code WHERE A.exchange_stock_history_code = #{ exchangeStockHistoryCode };

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT A.exchange_code , B.status , C.order_code , GROUP_CONCAT(E.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS item_name , A.sum_price , A.created_at , CASE WHEN B.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN B.created_at ELSE NULL END AS completed_at FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON B.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND B.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at JOIN tbl_order C ON A.order_code = C.order_code JOIN tbl_exchange_item D ON A.exchange_code = D.exchange_code JOIN tbl_item E ON D.item_code = E.item_code JOIN tbl_franchise F ON C.franchise_code = F.franchise_code WHERE F.franchise_code = ( SELECT B.franchise_code FROM tbl_member A JOIN tbl_franchise_member B ON A.member_code = B.member_code WHERE A.id = #{ loginId } ) GROUP BY A.exchange_code) AS grouped_result;

SELECT A.exchange_code , B.status , C.order_code , GROUP_CONCAT(E.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS item_name , A.sum_price , A.created_at , CASE WHEN B.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN B.created_at ELSE NULL END AS completed_at FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON B.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND B.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at JOIN tbl_order C ON A.order_code = C.order_code JOIN tbl_exchange_item D ON A.exchange_code = D.exchange_code JOIN tbl_item E ON D.item_code = E.item_code JOIN tbl_franchise F ON C.franchise_code = F.franchise_code WHERE F.franchise_code = ( SELECT B.franchise_code FROM tbl_member A JOIN tbl_franchise_member B ON A.member_code = B.member_code WHERE A.id = #{ loginId } ) GROUP BY A.exchange_code LIMIT #{ offset }, #{ pageSize };

SELECT A.exchange_code , B.status , C.order_code , GROUP_CONCAT(E.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS item_name , A.sum_price , A.created_at , CASE WHEN B.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN B.created_at ELSE NULL END AS completed_at FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON B.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND B.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at JOIN tbl_order C ON A.order_code = C.order_code JOIN tbl_exchange_item D ON A.exchange_code = D.exchange_code JOIN tbl_item E ON D.item_code = E.item_code JOIN tbl_franchise F ON C.franchise_code = F.franchise_code
F.franchise_code = ( SELECT B.franchise_code FROM tbl_member A JOIN tbl_franchise_member B ON A.member_code = B.member_code WHERE A.id = #{ loginId } )
AND CAST(A.exchange_code AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND E.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.created_at BETWEEN #{ startDate } AND CONCAT(#{ endDate }, ' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY A.exchange_code LIMIT #{ offset }, #{ pageSize };

SELECT A.exchange_code , A.created_at , B.status , C.order_code , A.reason , A.explanation FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_exchange_status_history B ON A.exchange_code = B.exchange_code JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON B.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND B.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at JOIN tbl_order C ON A.order_code = C.order_code WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode } GROUP BY A.exchange_code;

SELECT B.item_unique_code , B.name AS item_name , A.quantity , B.selling_price , (A.quantity * B.selling_price) AS sum_price FROM tbl_exchange_item A JOIN tbl_item B ON A.item_code = B.item_code WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode };
SELECT A.status , A.created_at AS processed_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history A WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode }

SELECT A.status FROM tbl_exchange_status_history A JOIN ( SELECT exchange_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_exchange_status_history GROUP BY exchange_code ) latest_status ON A.exchange_code = latest_status.exchange_code AND A.created_at = latest_status.max_created_at WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode }

SELECT B.name AS approver_name , C.name AS position , A.approved AS approval , A.created_at FROM tbl_exchange_approver A JOIN tbl_member B ON A.member_code = B.member_code JOIN tbl_position C ON B.position_code = C.position_code WHERE exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode } AND A.active != false;

SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code JOIN tbl_franchise_member D ON B.franchise_code= D.franchise_code JOIN tbl_member E ON D.member_code = E.member_code WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode } AND E.id = #{ loginId } ) AS result;
